channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Move over, Magnificent 7: Goldman Sachs proposes the ‘Prom 10,’ China’s top stocks including Tencent, Alibaba and BYD
item.description: Goldman Sachs recently highlighted 10 different Chinese stocks that it thinks are best poised for growth. Together, they make up the “Prominent 10."

item.title: A 1-day class early in this CEO’s career made him ‘maniacal’ about time management—and freed him up to coach baseball
item.description: “It was a game changer for me,” said Ryder System CEO and chairman Robert Sanchez.

item.title: Inside a Midwestern dental hygienist’s unlikely path to Fortune 500 CEO
item.description: Terry Rasmussen’s path to CEO of Thrivent Financial is anything but traditional.

item.title: Trump’s threat of ‘regime change’ in Iran is being greeted with calm and enthusiasm by the markets
item.description: Investors are unconcerned about major oil disruptions, reasoning that Iran is unlikely to close the Strait of Hormuz and harm its own economy.

item.title: Europe frets about U.S. retreating from region ahead of NATO
item.description: Europeans remain in the dark about Trump’s plans, but officials fear a larger withdrawal that could jeopardize security.

item.title: Crude-oil futures have lost of all their gains from the U.S. attack on Iran
Stock futures trim losses as oil prices moderate following U.S. strike on Iran
S&P 500 futures on cusp of turning positive as European stock markets open
Dow futures down just 230 points as oil futures jump after U.S. bombs Iran
